latest_revision.text:
== Overview ==
I first came to HeatSync Labs in 2013 and didn't really know how to make things. I've learned a lot since then, but there's always more to learn. I want to help keep the community active and encourage new people to work on their projects and help teach others.

== Current Roles ==
*LEGO Station Champion
*Laser Certification Instructor
*Young Makers Mentor
*Volunteermatch.org Coordinator

== Past Roles ==
*HeatSync Labs Board Secretary
*Robot Night Host
*Electronics Study Group Host
*New Member Orientation Coordinator

== Projects ==
*[[Woodworking Day]]
*[[Streamlining Engagement]]
*[[Hosting_Signup_Solution | Hosting Spreadsheet]]
*[[VolunteerMatch]]
*[[Laser Example Book]]
*[[Event Notifications]]
*[[Station Screensavers]]

== Skills ==
*Inkscape Design
*Laser Cutting
*Vinyl Cutting
*Some electronics
*Some Arduino Programming
*AutoHotkey automating (I'm a bit rusty)

== Learning ==
*Still learning Lightburn
*Still learning Inkscape
*Learning to write things yay Wiki
*Should be learning to not take on everything and focus better
*Learning more 3d printing thanks to Beau, Arnob and of course Antonio

==Events==
*[[Monthly_Laser_Meetup | Monthly Laser Meetup]]
*[[Trick_Or_Treat | Trick Or Treat]]
*[[Build-A-Bot]]
*[[Young_Makers | Young Makers]]

== Other volunteering ==
*Host Saturday Open Hours noon - 5pm
*Encourage people to host Open Hours
*Plan events like LEGO Day, Tech Tear Apart, Stamp Making and more.
*Post new events to Guestlist and the HeatSync Labs Google Calendar
*Manage and email people interested in classes [https://www.heatsynclabs.org/register this page]
